ing: 1 large English (seedless) cucumber - peeled, seeded, and cubed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "Mmm. With a salad, it's a good light meal, or try it as a side with grilled chicken. Serve with lemon wheels and dill as a garnish."
ins: Place cucumber, green onions, lemon juice, dill, yogurt, chicken stock, salt, and black pepper in a blender. Puree until smooth; chill at least 1 hour before serving.
